1000 wishes I could pray,

1000 sounds a mouth could talk,
1000 times i’ll b true,
1000 ways 2 say i luv u!..
hApPy VaLenTineS DaY..!!

entry.title: Girlfriend, Husband | Wife.. Express Your Feelings With Love Poetry, P
entry.content:
best Girlfriend, Husband | Wife.. Express Your Feelings with Love Poetry, Poems

If I could have all the time in the world,
I know what I would do:
I’d spend the time.
In pleasure sublime,
Just by being with you
Happy Confession Day

best Girlfriend, Husband | Wife.. Express Your Feelings with Love Poetry, Poems

Take things as they are.
Punch when you have to punch.
Kick when you have to kick.
Bruce Lee


Girlfriend, Husband | Wife.. Express Your Feelings With Love Poetry, P

‘U’ ‘R’ the twinkle of my eyes…
The smile on my lips….
The joy of my face….
With-out “U” Dear I’m incomplete….
Plz Always Be With Me….
Happy Teddy Bear Day

entry.title: Chocolate Day 2014 Sms For Computer Desktop
entry.content:
best valentines day sms

I wil not play tug o war.
I would rather play hug o’ war.
Where everi-1 hugs instead of tugs,
Where everi-1 giggles & rolls on the rug,
Where everi-1 kises,
& every-1 grins,
& every-1 cuddles,
& every-1 wins.
Happy Hug Day…


best valentines day sms

Jeena Chaahunde haan par jindagi ras ni aaundi????
Marnaa chaahunde haan par Maut saade paas ni aaundi,
!!!!Bahut Udaas haan asin is Zindagi ton!!!!
Sajni Teri Yaad v tey Tadpaaon tu baaz ni aaundi>
Happy Valentines day Sajni…


Chocolate Day 2014 Sms For Computer Desktop

Beauty is an ecstasy
it is as simple as hunger
There is really nothing to be said about it
It is like the perfume of a rose
you can smell it and that is all.
Happy Perfume Day 2013>>>>
